name: UContentBrowserSettings
doc: Implements content browser settings.  These are global not per-project

NumObjectsToLoadBeforeWarning: The number of objects to load at once in the Content Browser before displaying a warning about loading many assets
bDisplayContentFolderSuffix: Whether to append 'Content' text to displayed folder names
bDisplayFriendlyNameForPluginFolders: Whether display friendly name as plugin folder names
bEnableRealtimeMaterialInstanceThumbnail: Enables the rendering of Material Instance thumbnail previews
